keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Cédric Herrou has become something of a folk hero in France for resisting the state and taking a stand: that it is simply right to help migrants seeking a better life.
snippet: Cédric Herrou has become something of a folk hero in France for resisting the state and taking a stand: that it is simply right to help migrants seeking a better life....

headline.main: Farmer on Trial Defends Smuggling Migrants: ‘I Am a Frenchman.’
headline.print_headline: A Smuggler’s Defense: ‘There Are People Dying’
